description.narrative: Fundacion Melimoyu will continue efforts to establish marine protected areas (MPAs) along the Chilean coast of Northern Patagonia. Following on its recent success in establishing a mosaic of MPAs in the Tictoc Marine Park, Melimoyu will now work to create a network of MPAs to establish the Corcovado Marine Park. As part of these efforts, the foundation will work with other NGOs and key stakeholders in the region to coordinate and consolidate strategy for marine conservation and will prepare a technical proposal for the establishment of the new MPAs. Melimoyu will start a dialogue with local salmon farming industry representatives to improve environmental management practices around proposed MPAs. Melimoyu will develop and implement a communications campaign to raise public awareness and political willingness.
